reason1Desc: Buka ku-Smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, amadivayisi e-Blu-ray, nokunye okuningi.
reason2Desc: Londoloza izinto ozithandayo kalula bese uzibuka ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi nganoma yisiphi isikhathi.
reason3Desc: Sakaza ama-movie angenamkhawulo kwifoni yakho, ithebhulethi, ilaptop, ne-TV.
reason4Desc: Thumela izingane ezindaweni zokuzijabulisa nezithombe abazincomayo â€” mahhala ngemvume yakho yokubhalisela.
faqA1: I-Blockbusters iyinsiza yokusakaza okuqukethwe okudingekayo okudinga ubulungu, evumela ukubuka ama-movie amaningi kumadivayisi axhunywe ku-inthanethi.
faqA2: I-Blockbusters inohlelo oluningi kuye ngokuthi zingaki izikrini nekhwalithi yevidiyo. Amanani aqala ku-$9.99 ngenyanga, kodwa angahluka ngokuya ngesifunda.
faqA3: Ungabuka i-Blockbusters kuma-smartphone, ama-tablet, ama-smart TV, amakhompyutha kanye nama-console okugembula axhunyiwe ku-inthanethi.
faqA4: Ungayikhansela noma yinini i-akhawunti yakho ye-Blockbusters kusethaphutheni ze-akhawunti. Akukho mali yokukhansela.
faqA6: Yebo, i-Blockbusters inemodi yezingane evimbela okuqukethwe okungafanele futhi inikeze ukuphepha okwengeziwe.
